	${FREEIMAGE_PROJECT_DIR}/Source/OpenEXR/Imath/ImathSphere.h
	${FREEIMAGE_PROJECT_DIR}/Source/OpenEXR/Imath/ImathVec.h
	${FREEIMAGE_PROJECT_DIR}/Source/OpenEXR/Imath/ImathVecAlgo.h
)
SET(OPENEXR_HEADER_FILES
	${FREEIMAGE_PROJECT_DIR}/Source/OpenEXR/IlmBaseConfig.h
	${FREEIMAGE_PROJECT_DIR}/Source/OpenEXR/OpenEXRConfig.h
)

SOURCE_GROUP("Source Files\\Half Source Files" FILES ${OPENEXR_HALF_SOURCE_FILES})
SOURCE_GROUP("Source Files\\Iex Source Files" FILES ${OPENEXR_IEX_SOURCE_FILES})
SOURCE_GROUP("Source Files\\IexMath Source Files" FILES ${OPENEXR_IEXMATH_SOURCE_FILES})
SOURCE_GROUP("Source Files\\IlmImf Source Files" FILES ${OPENEXR_ILMIMF_SOURCE_FILES})
SOURCE_GROUP("Source Files\\IlmThread Source Files" FILES ${OPENEXR_ILMTHREAD_SOURCE_FILES})
SOURCE_GROUP("Source Files\\Imath Source Files" FILES ${OPENEXR_IMATH_SOURCE_FILES})
SOURCE_GROUP("Header Files\\Half Header Files" FILES ${OPENEXR_HALF_HEADER_FILES})
SOURCE_GROUP("Header Files\\Iex Header Files" FILES ${OPENEXR_IEX_HEADER_FILES})
SOURCE_GROUP("Header Files\\IexMath Header Files" FILES ${OPENEXR_IEXMATH_HEADER_FILES})
SOURCE_GROUP("Header Files\\IlmImf Header Files" FILES ${OPENEXR_ILMIMF_HEADER_FILES})
SOURCE_GROUP("Header Files\\IlmThread Header Files" FILES ${OPENEXR_ILMTHREAD_HEADER_FILES})
SOURCE_GROUP("Header Files\\Imath Header Files" FILES ${OPENEXR_IMATH_HEADER_FILES})
SOURCE_GROUP("Header Files" FILES ${OPENEXR_HEADER_FILES})

ADD_LIBRARY(${LIB_NAME} STATIC
	${OPENEXR_HALF_SOURCE_FILES} ${OPENEXR_IEX_SOURCE_FILES} ${OPENEXR_IEXMATH_SOURCE_FILES}
	${OPENEXR_ILMIMF_SOURCE_FILES} ${OPENEXR_ILMTHREAD_SOURCE_FILES} ${OPENEXR_IMATH_SOURCE_FILES}
	${OPENEXR_HALF_HEADER_FILES} ${OPENEXR_IEX_HEADER_FILES} ${OPENEXR_IEXMATH_HEADER_FILES}
	${OPENEXR_ILMIMF_HEADER_FILES} ${OPENEXR_ILMTHREAD_HEADER_FILES} ${OPENEXR_IMATH_HEADER_FILES}
	${OPENEXR_HEADER_FILES}
)

if(KLAYGE_PLATFORM_WINDOWS)
	target_compile_definitions(${LIB_NAME}
		PRIVATE
			-D_CRT_SECURE_NO_DEPRECATE
	)
endif()

target_include_directories(${LIB_NAME}
	PRIVATE
		${FREEIMAGE_PROJECT_DIR}/Source/OpenEXR
		${FREEIMAGE_PROJECT_DIR}/Source/OpenEXR/IlmImf
		${FREEIMAGE_PROJECT_DIR}/Source/OpenEXR/Imath
		${FREEIMAGE_PROJECT_DIR}/Source/OpenEXR/IexMath
		${FREEIMAGE_PROJECT_DIR}/Source/OpenEXR/Iex
		${FREEIMAGE_PROJECT_DIR}/Source/OpenEXR/Half
		${FREEIMAGE_PROJECT_DIR}/Source/OpenEXR/IlmThread
		${ZLIB_INCLUDE_DIRS}
)

SET_TARGET_PROPERTIES(${LIB_NAME} PROPERTIES
	PROJECT_LABEL ${LIB_NAME}
	OUTPUT_NAME ${LIB_NAME}${KLAYGE_OUTPUT_SUFFIX}
)

TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(${LIB_NAME}
	PRIVATE
		${KLAYGE_ZLIB_NAME}
)
